Need Valentine’s Day plans? Use code DATE20 and get 20% off lane reservations. Reserve a Lane >>
Bowlero Charlotte
Today's Hours:5pm - 2am
Today's Special:After Party
Need help planning an event? Contact an Event Planner
Welcome to Bowlero Charlotte
Bowlero Charlotte is your go-to destination for bowling and entertainment in Charlotte, NC. With 18 high-quality lanes and one of the best arcades in the area, it’s a favorite for families, friends, and anyone looking for a fun night out.
Whether you're exploring arcade bars around Charlotte or just want to enjoy a few games with great food and drinks, Bowlero Charlotte has you covered. Kick back at the sports bar, spend time in the comfortable lounge, or host your next event in one of the private party rooms. The center is fully wheelchair accessible, making it easy for everyone to join the fun. Reserve your lane online today and experience one of the top bowling centers in Charlotte, North Carolina.
210 E Trade Street D-164Charlotte, NC 28202
Amenities
What's Happening at Bowlero Charlotte
Unlimited Bowling & Arcade Play
Monday, February 16 | 11AM – 5PM
All the strikes, all the games, all the fun!
Enjoy unlimited bowling & shoe rental for just $17.99 and unlimited arcade play for just $17.99. Double the fun with endless games on the lanes and in the arcade!
Valid 2/16/26, 11AM-5PM. Subject to lane availability. Arcade play is non-redemption only. Terms & conditions apply. Visit a location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
What's going on today
Weekly Promotions at Bowlero Charlotte
After Party
Keep the night alive with After Party, our special that gives you unlimited bowling for only $28.99. Perfect for friends, fun, and unforgettable nights out.
Friday starting at 8PM
Price per person. Shoe rental not included. Subject to lane availability. Terms & conditions apply. Visit location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
The Special
Daily | Open – Close
Buy two games, get the third 50% off!
The Special makes every game more fun (and more affordable). Gather your crew, hit the lanes, and keep the good times rolling.
Subject to lane availability. Shoe rental not included. Visit location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
Pizza & Pitcher Combo
This crowd-favorite combo features hot cheese or pepperoni pizza and a pitcher of ice-cold margarita, beer or soda, all for an unbeatable price. Take advantage of this incredible offer while it lasts.
Pizza & Pitcher Details
Pricing may vary. Valid at participating locations. Visit a location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
Caramel Apple Craft Lemonade
Sweet meets tart in this refreshing sip: crisp apple flavor blended with a swirl of rich caramel, served ice-cold for the perfect refresh. Order one, bowl a few frames, and keep things fresh at Bowlero.
Lemonade Details
Night Strike
During Night Strike, enjoy unlimited bowling (shoe rental included!) for only $21.99—the perfect way to keep the party going.
Sunday starting at 6PM
Monday starting at 7PM
Tuesday starting at 7PM
Wednesday starting at 7PM
Thursday starting at 7PM
Price per person. Subject to lane availability. Terms & conditions apply. Visit location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
Unlimited Arcade Play
Sunday – Thursday | Open – Close
Level up with 1 hour of unlimited arcade play for just $25.
Keep the fun going with 2 hours of unlimited arcade play for only $32.
Price per person. Subject to availability. Non-redemption only. Terms & conditions apply. Visit location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.
Enjoy unlimited bowling & shoe rental for $17.99 and unlimited arcade play for $17.99. Double the fun with endless games on the lanes and in the arcade!
Valid 2/16/26, 11AM-5PM. Subject to lane availability and valid at participating centers only. Arcade play is non-redemption only. Terms & conditions apply.
Half-Price Arcade Play
Every Wednesday | Open – Close
Get your game on and enjoy 50% off arcade play all day long. Play more of your favorites for less, from classic cabinets to modern must-plays.
Subject to availability. Terms & conditions apply. Visit location for complete details. Management reserves all rights.

Sweet Spot
Join a League
Team up. Make friends. Have fun!
Our leagues and social clubs offer lively competition and laid-back fun for everyone from beginners to pros. Make new friends, hang out with your BFFs, improve your game, and get awesome perks—all in Traditional or Short-Season Leagues.
Find a League Near You

Contact an Event PlannerWelcome to Bowlero CharlotteBowlero Charlotte is your go-to destination for bowling and entertainment in Charlotte, NC. With 18 high-quality lanes and one of the best arcades in the area, it’s a favorite for families, friends, and anyone looking for a fun night out.
Whether you're exploring arcade bars around Charlotte or just want to enjoy a few games with great food and drinks, Bowlero Charlotte has you covered. Kick back at the sports bar, spend time in the comfortable lounge, or host your next event in one of the private party rooms. The center is fully wheelchair accessible, making it easy for everyone to join the fun.
